title: FLIGHT 008 | The Dream of a Common Language: Seat 2K
itunes:title: FLIGHT 008 | The Dream of a Common Language: Seat 2K
itunes:subtitle: Enjoy this special release of season two's FLIGHT 008, written by Kathleen Ann Goonan,. This never-released episode examines the future through global literacy and is performed by the incredible Rosalind Ayres.
description:
